info.+content: One-Punch Man is a super hero who has trained so hard that his hair has fallen out, and who can overcome any enemy with one punch. However, because he is so strong, he has become bored and frustrated with winning all his battles so easily.
となりのヤングジャンプ : ワンパンマン
[第1話] ワンパンマン - 原作/ＯＮＥ/漫画/村田雄介 | となりのヤングジャンプ
